titles.title: A bill for the relief of the city of Minot, North Dakota.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 8/4/1987--Introduced. Relieves a city in North Dakota from liability for repayment of a specified sum associated with excess capacity of the Minot Pipeline resulting from enactment of the Garrison Diversion Unit Reformulation Act of 1986 (Public Law 99-294). Requires such city to reimburse the United States for such excess capacity ever actually used.
